attributes.action: keep and create more government funded places in university for nurse training.
attributes.additional_details: Unions and I believe that this approach will not encourage more people to become nurses but will in fact discourage people from becoming nurses.
attributes.background: George Osborne has proposed to universities that places can be funded by student loans  so there is no cap on the amount of places available. They believe this will allow more people to enter a nurse training programme and create more nurses for our country.
